DWHO0763.path: ../Doctor Who/Dr. Who 076 - The Ark In Space 3.m4v
DWHO0763.title: The Ark in Space (part 3)
DWHO0763.description: Knowing that Noah has been infected by the Wirrn, the Doctor persuades Vira to halt the reviving of her people, knowing it will place them in danger as well.

MDRN1936.title: Modern Times
MDRN1936.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

RT66003.title: The Swan Bed
RT66003.description: Tod and Buz layover to work in New Orleans and make the acquaintance of a young woman who accidentally interferes with a smuggling ring.The young woman's melancholy mother and the danger of an epidemic add to the difficulties.

DWHO0771.title: The Sontaran Experiment (part 1)
DWHO0771.description: The Doctor, Sarah and Harry teleports to Earth to ensure the planet is safe for the survivors on-board Nerva Beacon to return to Earth and re-inhabit their world. Only to find a Sontaran named Styre has captured a group of humans and conducting experiments on them.

RT66004.title: The Man on the Monkey Board
RT66004.path: ../Route 66/Route 66 - 004 The Man on the Monkey Board.m4v
RT66004.description: Tod and Buz take labor jobs on a Louisiana offshore oil rig. Tod immediately finds the behavior of a seemingly out-of-place older worker to be odd. As Tod continues to watch the man he finds the strange behavior has a sane purpose-the man is a Nazi hunter who is closing in on his prey.

CSCR02.title: Winged Assassin
CSCR02.description: The Mysterons second target is the Director General of the United Asian Republic. The Director is on a visit to London and is scheduled to fly back to Asia via London airport but the Mysterons have other plans.

0030707C.title: Gamera the Invincible
0030707C.description: An atomic explosion awakens Gammera — a giant, fire-breathing turtle monster — from his millions of years of hibernation. Enraged at being roused from such a sound sleep, he takes it out on Tokyo. (Dubbed)

CHOP1961.title: The Choppers
CHOP1961.description: A gang of teenage delinquents terrorize a small community by stealing cars and stripping them for parts, then selling the parts to a crooked junkyard owner. The police and an insurance company investigator set out to break up the gang.

OFUK02.title: Work Experience
OFUK02.description: David hires Donna, his lodger and the daughter of his best friend. While showing her round the office he discovers a doctored pornographic image of himself. Gareth, due to his covert operations skills, is told to catch the culprit.

SPRA03.title: Challenge of the Masked Racer - Part 1
SPRA03.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 03 Challenge of the Masked Racer (part 1, SD).m4v
SPRA03.description: Speed's first encounter with Racer X, a mysterious masked driver who is rumored to cause car crashes whenever he races.

JOQU02.title: Arctic Splashdown
JOQU02.description: A rocket malfunctions and crashes in the Arctic. Dr. Benton Quest is dispatched to find the rocket but must contend with operatives of a hostile foreign power who seek the same thing he is.

PRSN02.title: The Chimes of Big Ben
PRSN02.path: ../Prisoner, The/Prisoner, The 02 - The Chimes Of Big Ben.m4v
PRSN02.description: A new Number Eight named Nadia arrives in the Village, and together she and Number Six plot their escape.

HONW02.title: The Owl and the Eye
HONW02.path: ../Honey West/Honey West 02 - The Owl and the Eye.mp4
HONW02.description: Honey and Sam are hired by a art museum's insurance company to prove how easy it is to bypass its security measures. After proving the insurance company's point, the private investigators agree to furnish an elaborate new system - which is promptly evaded by art thieves.

FETM01.title: Can We Do This?
FETM01.path: ../From the Earth to the Moon/From the Earth to the Moon - 1 Can We Do This.m4v
FETM01.description: The United States launches an aggressive plan to beat the Soviets to the moon.

WARS1979.title: The Warriors
WARS1979.description: A street gang known as The Warriors must fight their way from the Bronx to their home turf on Coney Island when they are falsely accused of assassinating a respected gang leader.

CON102.title: Death in the Morning
CON102.description: Follow the connections from ancient Egyptian traders all the way up to modern radar and nuclear energy. You'll make stops along the way which include money, touch stones, sailing, vacuum pumps, weather charts, and hot air balloons.

LISP07.title: My Friend, Mr. Nobody
LISP07.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 07 My Friend, Mr. Nobody.m4v
LISP07.description: Penny strikes up a friendship with a deep voice in a deep cave.

MSTK0102.title: The Robot vs. the Aztec Mummy
MSTK0102.path: ../MST3K/MST3K 102 - The Robot vs. the Aztec Mummy.m4v
MSTK0102.description: The Mads fall victim to their own newly-installed security system, and the unfortunately-shaped Satellite of Love is besieged by Demon Dogs hoping to pray to the Giant Bone.

LISP09.title: The Oasis
LISP09.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 09 The Oasis.m4v
LISP09.description: Smith eats some fruit that turns him into a paranoid giant.

STAN02.title: Yesteryear
STAN02.path: ../Star Trek Animated Series/Star Trek Animated Series - 02 Yesteryear.m4v
STAN02.description: After finding himself erased from recent history, Spock must travel back in time to save himself as a youth.

CADF02.title: The Sanctuary Sparrow
CADF02.description: Liliwin is a poor acrobat hired to entertain at an Aurifaber wedding. But when he is dismissed and the master of the house is found unconscious and robbed, Cadfael must find the real thief before the mob takes vengeance.

PUFO02.title: The Joshua Flats
PUFO02.path: ../Project U.F.O./Project U.F.O. - S1E2 - The Joshua Flats.mp4
PUFO02.description: Prominent citizens of a town report seeing a UFO, but investigators cannot get information from them and turn instead to an eleven-year-old boy.

LITB010.title: Wally's Girl Trouble
LITB010.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 010 Wally's Girl Trouble.mp4
LITB010.description: Although he can't understand why any boy would give up fishing to spend time with a girl, Beaver still tries to help brother Wally make up after a fight with pretty Penny.

HARA1962.title: Harakiri
HARA1962.description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

ULTR04.title: Five Seconds Before the Explosion
ULTR04.description: A nuclear bomb has gone missing and winds up being stuck to a lizard-like monster. This monster is bent on ruining Fuji's vacation.

PEEP1960.title: Peeping Tom
PEEP1960.description: A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

PATV01.title: Escape from Tomorrow
PATV01.path: ../Planet Of The Apes (Television)/Planet Of The Apes TV 01.mp4
PATV01.description: Two astronauts survive a crash-landing on a planet where intelligent apes rule over humans. The men find that their own intelligence challenges the apes' superiority and puts their lives in danger.

LITB006.title: Brotherly Love
LITB006.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 006 Brotherly Love.mp4
LITB006.description: June makes Wally and Beaver sign a friendship pact to stop them from fighting and do more things together. But when each boy is offered a Saturday activity that doesn't include the other, they find the pact is not so easy to keep.

LITB007.title: Water Anyone?
LITB007.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 007 Water Anyone.mp4
LITB007.description: Beaver is left out when Ward and the other neighborhood dads offer to pay Wally and his friends for doing outdoor chores to help them buy uniforms. But, after Beaver finds out that the main water line will be shut off on a very hot day, he loads up his wagon with full water buckets and makes his own money ... at five cents a cup!

NIGA00.title: The Cemetary, Eyes, The Escape Route
NIGA00.path: ../Night Gallery/Night Gallery - 00 The Cemetary, Eyes, The Escape Route.m4v

LITB008.title: Beaver's Crush
LITB008.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 008 Beaver's Crush.mp4
LITB008.description: Beaver's crush on his teacher Miss Canfield and teasing by the other kids leads him to put a spring snake in her desk drawer.

DWHO07614.path: ../Doctor Who/Dr. Who 076 - The Ark In Space 4.m4v
DWHO07614.title: The Ark in Space (part 4)
DWHO07614.description: The Doctor tries to protect the humans still in cryogenic suspension from the Wirrn, who are determined to use Earth as their new breeding ground.

LITB009.title: The Clubhouse
LITB009.path: ../Leave it to Beaver/Leave it to Beaver - 009 The Clubhouse.mp4
LITB009.description: A rainy day indoors prompts Wally and his friends to build a clubhouse across the street. When Beaver can only join if he comes up with $3, he decides to hit the streets with a newfound entrepreneurial spirit.

CITY1931.title: City Lights
CITY1931.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

CIJ1940.title: Christmas in July
CIJ1940.description: When the co-workers of an ambitious clerk trick him into thinking he has won $25,000 in a slogan contest, he begins to use the money to fulfill his dreams. What will happen when the ruse is discovered?

TISM1957.title: The Incredible Shrinking Man
TISM1957.description: When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

FWLT02.title: The Builders
FWLT02.description: Over his wife's objections, Basil hires his usual firm of incompetents to do some carpentry work in the hotel lobby.

SPRA04.title: Challenge of the Masked Racer - Part 2
SPRA04.path: ../Speed Racer/Speed Racer - 04 Challenge of the Masked Racer (part 2).mp4
SPRA04.description: Speed Racer and Racer X participate in the Trans-Country race... as well as competitors who stoop to dirty tricks to get rid of them.

DRHI02.title: Chicago
DRHI02.description: Al Capone gets destroyed by an unlikely enemy, prairie lawyer Abraham Lincoln gets a huge break, and the police go to war with protestors during the Haymarket Riot. Guest starring Ike Barinholtz, Joe Lo Truglio, Matt Besser.

AHCP005.title: Into Thin Air
AHCP005.path: ../Alfred Hitchcock Presents/Alfred Hitchcock Presents 005 - Into Thin Air.m4v
AHCP005.description: When a young woman leaves her ill mother in a Paris hotel room and comes back later, she finds her mother is missing, and all the hotel's employees deny she and her mother were ever there.

WOLF1941.title: The Wolf Man
WOLF1941.description: Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.

LRSS02.title: The Promise
LRSS02.path: ../Larry Sanders Show, The/Larry Sanders Show, The - 02 The Promise.m4v
LRSS02.description: Larry is upset when the up-and-coming comedian David Spade appears on rival Jay Leno's late-night talk show and tells the same jokes he was supposed to tell on his show first; Hank gives his elderly groupies a tour of the studio.

TWZN005.title: Walking Distance
TWZN005.description: A man travels back in time to his childhood, arriving just a few miles away from his native town.

AHCP007.title: Breakdown
AHCP007.description: William Callew is involved in a bad traffic accident on a rural road, that leaves him so paralyzed he appears lifeless, and when help arrives they think he's really dead.

AHCP006.title: Salvage
AHCP006.description: Gangster Dan Varrell, just released from prison, goes looking for the woman he holds responsible for his brother's death.

AHCP008.title: Our Cook's a Treasure
AHCP008.path: ../Alfred Hitchcock Presents/Alfred Hitchcock Presents 008 - Our Cook's A Treasure.m4v
AHCP008.description: A serial-murderess maid is on the loose in the city. Ralph becomes suspicious of his wife Ethel's housemaid Mrs. Sutton.

TWZN006.title: Escape Clause
TWZN006.description: A hypochondriac man sells his soul to the devil, exchanging it for several thousand years of immortality.

AHCP009.title: The Long Shot
AHCP009.path: ../Alfred Hitchcock Presents/Alfred Hitchcock Presents 009 - The Long Shot.m4v
AHCP009.description: Heavily indebted Charlie Raymond is hired to accompany a British visitor on a trip across the USA, and looks for a way to take advantage of his employer.

CYRA1950.title: Cyrano de Bergerac
CYRA1950.description: The charismatic swordsman-poet helps another woo the woman he loves in this straightforward version of the play.

ZATV02.title: The Flower That Bloomed with the Lullaby
ZATV02.description: A young child falls under Zatoichi's care. As the child's secret origin is revealed, others become very interested in its fate.

SIVA02.title: The Cap Table
SIVA02.description: Richard hires Jared to design a business plan. Big Head is asked to work for Gavin Belson, where he discovers that Hooli has stolen the Pied Piper algorithm and calls it Nucleus. Meanwhile Richard struggles to get his money from Gregory.

TWZN004.title: The Sixteen Millimeter Shrine
TWZN004.path: ../Twilight Zone/Twilight Zone - 004 The Sixteen Millimeter Shrine.mp4
TWZN004.description: Barbara Jean Trenton is a faded film star who lives in the past by constantly re-watching her old movies instead of moving on with her life, so her associates try to lure her out of her self-imposed isolation.

RBBT01.title: Marionettes, Inc.,
RBBT01.path: ../Ray Bradbury Theater/Ray Bradbury Theater - 01 Marionettes, Inc.m4v
RBBT01.description: Mysterious Fantoccini offers an unhappy overworked suburbanite husband the services of his high tech company. He'll be replaced by a robot duplicate both at home and work. However, the man becomes jealous of his perfect double.

LISP06.title: Welcome Stranger
LISP06.path: ../Lost in Space/Lost in Space - 06 Welcome Stranger.m4v
LISP06.description: The Robinsons meet a fellow Earth explorer who is also lost in space. They help him repair his ship and ask him to take Will and Penny home.

TREK03.title: Where No Man Has Gone Before
TREK03.path: ../Star Trek TOS/Star Trek - 03 Where No Man Has Gone Before.mp4
TREK03.description: The flight recorder of the 200-year-old U.S.S. Valiant relays a tale of terror — a magnetic storm at the edge of the galaxy!

TPOD01.title: A Village in England: July, 2089 AD
TPOD01.description: Will meets a strange vagrant that tells him the truth about capping, and a place in The White Mountains for free men. Will and Henry decide to leave their village to find it.

ICLD02.title: Family Affairs
ICLD02.description: It is now 9 BC. Livia has poisoned Agrippa and Tiberius is being forced to divorce his wife Vipsania to marry Julia.

SOKO02.title: Nucleon: The Magic Globe
SOKO02.path: ../Johnny Sokko/Johnny Sokko - 02 Nucleon, The Magic Globe.m4v
SOKO02.description: Emperor Guillotine, king of BF syndicate, plans to take back Giant Robot and to arrest Daisaku (Johhny Sokko), the only one that can give orders to the robot. He sends a huge magic metal globe called Glober to the earth.

ACGS02.path: ../All Creatures Great and Small/All Creatures Great and Small - 02 Another Farnon.m4v
ACGS02.title: Another Farnon?

DNMN02.title: The Professionals
DNMN02.description: An important M9 agent has gone missing in Prague, and Drake's sent in as a British diplomat to find him. It appears a blackmail ring is operating, and soon, Drake has to rescue the agent, and his family, from death.

MYDC1946.title: My Darling Clementine
MYDC1946.description: After their cattle are stolen and their brother murdered, the Earp brothers have a score to settle with the Clanton family.

BSG102.title: Lost Planet of the Gods (part 2)
BSG102.path: ../Battlestar Galactica TOS/Battlestar Galactica 03 - Lost Planet of the Gods (part 2).m4v
BSG102.description: After traversing a large void in space, the Galactica and the refugee fleet discover the home planet of their species, Kobol.

ULTR03.title: Science Patrol, Move Out!
ULTR03.description: An invisible monster that thrives on electricity begins destroying power plants in Japan.

BROK1919.title: Broken Blossoms
BROK1919.description: A young girl, abused by her alcoholic prizefighting father, meets Cheng Huan, a kind Chinese man who falls in love with her. Lillian Gish stars — this film has her famous "closet scene".  Silent.

DWHO0761.path: ../Doctor Who/Dr. Who 076 - The Ark In Space 1.m4v
DWHO0761.title: The Ark in Space (part 1)
DWHO0761.description: The Doctor's attempt to give Harry a trip in the TARDIS sees the two of them and Sarah arriving onboard a space station in the far future, with some rather deadly security mechanisms.

DWHO0762.path: ../Doctor Who/Dr. Who 076 - The Ark In Space 2.m4v
DWHO0762.title: The Ark in Space (part 2)
DWHO0762.description: The Doctor and Harry revive the Ark's medtech, Vira, to help Sarah.But when station commander Noah is revived, he becomes suspicious of the newcomers.

CHMP02.title: The Invisible Man
CHMP02.description: Surgeon John Hallam has perfected an 'invisible man', a device which is transplanted into the ear and 'tells' people to obey instructions.
